about_the_game:
Drag and Drop Medieval is a captivating puzzle game set in a medieval world, where your main task is to move characters using your mouse. It may sound simple, but the game offers over 20 intricately designed levels, each with its own unique challenges and mechanics. Enjoy the charming pixel art graphics as you navigate through puzzles and uncover the secrets of this medieval realm.



Key Features:

  • Engaging Gameplay with Intuitive Drag-and-Drop Mechanics:

     Simple yet captivating gameplay where you move medieval characters with your mouse. Strategic thinking turns each move into a brain-teasing challenge.

  • Over 20 Challenging Levels with Unique Puzzles:

     Navigate through more than 20 levels, each with distinct puzzles that test your problem-solving skills and keep you entertained.

  • Charming Pixel Art Graphics:

     Enjoy visually appealing pixel art that brings the medieval world to life, enhancing the game's nostalgic and immersive atmosphere.

  • More than 10 Distinct Game Mechanics:

     Master a variety of mechanics, from moving obstacles to unlocking pathways, each adding new complexity and fun.

  • Unlock 5 Secret Achievements:

     Discover hidden secrets and unlock 5 achievements, rewarding your ingenuity and persistence as you solve the game's mysteries.

Feature List


About the Game



Drag and Drop Medieval is a captivating puzzle game set in a medieval world, where your main task is to move characters using your mouse. It may sound simple, but the game offers over 20 intricately designed levels, each with its own unique challenges and mechanics. Enjoy the charming pixel art graphics as you navigate through puzzles and uncover the secrets of this medieval realm.



Key Features:

  • Engaging Gameplay with Intuitive Drag-and-Drop Mechanics:

     Simple yet captivating gameplay where you move medieval characters with your mouse. Strategic thinking turns each move into a brain-teasing challenge.

  • Over 20 Challenging Levels with Unique Puzzles:

     Navigate through more than 20 levels, each with distinct puzzles that test your problem-solving skills and keep you entertained.

  • Charming Pixel Art Graphics:

     Enjoy visually appealing pixel art that brings the medieval world to life, enhancing the game's nostalgic and immersive atmosphere.

  • More than 10 Distinct Game Mechanics:

     Master a variety of mechanics, from moving obstacles to unlocking pathways, each adding new complexity and fun.

  • Unlock 5 Secret Achievements:

     Discover hidden secrets and unlock 5 achievements, rewarding your ingenuity and persistence as you solve the game's mysteries.
name: Drag and Drop Medieval

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 8 (64 Bit)
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Dual Core Processor
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated Graphics (512MB)
  • Storage: 230 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Additional Notes: Requires a system running DirectX 11 as a minimum. Graphics cards over 10 years old may find some graphics display issues. Unsupported video chipsets: Intel HD Graphics 3000, Intel GMA X3100, Intel GMA 950.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 (64 Bit)
  • Processor: 3.0GHz i5 Dual Core or equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 650 Radeon HD 3600 (1GB)
  • Storage: 230 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Additional Notes: Requires a system running DirectX 11 as a minimum. Graphics cards over 10 years old may find some graphics display issues. Unsupported video chipsets: Intel HD Graphics 3000, Intel GMA X3100, Intel GMA 950.

short_description: Drag and Drop Medieval is a medieval-themed puzzle game where you move characters with your mouse through over 20 challenging levels featuring unique mechanics and pixel art graphics.
